text: Giacomo Capuzzi (August 14, 1929 – December 26, 2021) was an Italian Roman Catholic prelate. He was a bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Lodi from 1989 until 2005. Capuzzi was born in Manerbio, Italy. He became a priest in 1952.XXV di Episcopato di S.E. Giacomo Capuzzi Capuzzi died on December 26, 2021 in Leno, Italy at the age of 92.È morto monsignor Giacomo Capuzzi, vescovo di Lodi dal 1989 al 2005 ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile of Mons. title: Giacomo Capuzzi
